sentences: Donald Newton Van Zant (born June 11, 1952) is an American rock singer, songwriter, and guitarist.
He is best known for being a member of the band 38 Special, from its formation in 1974 until 2013.

He is the middle of three sons; his older brother Ronnie was the original lead singer for Lynyrd Skynyrd who died in a 1977 plane crash in Mississippi, and his younger brother Johnny has been the lead singer for Lynyrd Skynyrd since 1987.
According to a posting in March 2013 on the 38 Special website, "Donnie Van Zant has not been able to join the band's performances for the past six months.
